abstract: As the formal U.N. climate talks got under way, a coalition of groups were busy preparing the finishing touches for their own 12-day conference.
snippet: As the formal U.N. climate talks got under way, a coalition of groups were busy preparing the finishing touches for their own 12-day conference.
lead_paragraph: As the formal United Nations climate talks got under way in the belly of Copenhagen’s Bella Center on Monday, just up the road, a broad coalition of Danish and international environmental movements, civil society organizations and freelance campaigners were busy launching a self-described “people’s summit.”
